remarks: A variant of ~ al2imi : instead of applying ` A. x ` quantifiers to the final implication, replace them with ` E. x ` .  A shorter proof is possible using ~ nfa1 , ~ sps and ~ eximd , but it depends on more axioms.  (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 18-Aug-2019.)
statement:
aleximi.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps -> ch ) ) $.
aleximi $p |- ( A. x ph -> ( E. x ps -> E. x ch ) ) $.
